title: luaurc
description: config file for the Luau language server

languageMode.description: type checking mode, can be one of `nocheck`, `nonstrict`, `strict`

lint.description: lints to enable; points to an object that maps string literals that correspond to the names of linting rules (see https://luau-lang.org/lint), or `*` that means "all rules", to a boolean (to enable/disable the lint)

lintErrors.description: a boolean that controls whether lint issues are reported as errors or warnings (off by default)

globals.description: extra global values; points to an array of strings where each string names a global that the type checker and linter must assume is valid and of type `any`
